verses.name: John 20:27
verses.text: Then saith he to Thomas, Reach hither thy finger, and behold my hands; and reach hither thy hand, and thrust it into my side: and be not faithless, but believing.

verses.name: John 20:28
verses.text: And Thomas answered and said unto him, My Lord and my God.

verses.name: John 20:29
verses.text: Jesus saith unto him, Thomas, because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed: blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed.

verses.name: John 20:30
verses.text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples, which are not written in this book:
